body.p: Newspaper inserts are reproduced in the <floatingText> element, which follows the parent newspaper issue in the <body> area (in exceptional cases in the <back> area). The <floatingText> element is always located within a parent <div> element of the first level.

Within the <floatingText> element, the basic structure elements of TEI documents <front>, <body> and <back> can again be used. For the structuring of the insert, the inventory for structuring newspaper issues and periodicals in general is available.
